about_the_game:
About the game

Dive into an exciting world of enchantment and discovery in our visual novel "Goblin Gangbang 🧟🍆👩". Immerse yourself in a unique narrative that combines whimsy and intrigue. Explore a hauntingly beautiful beach as you follow the journey of Emilia, a young girl who stumbles upon an unlikely companion in her quest to find her way home.

Story

Embark on an unforgettable adventure with Emilia, a fearless young girl with a brave heart. Lost and disoriented in a mysterious cave, Emiliafinds herself in a world that is both enchanting and treacherous. As she navigates this otherworldly world, she encounters the fearsome Goblins, whose intentions are still unclear.

Against the backdrop of the cave, Emilia discovers secrets that intertwine her fate with that of the mysterious Goblins. As their paths intertwine, you'll unravel a story of camaraderie, unexpected alliances, and the resilience of the human spirit.

Features

- Engaging Visual Novel: Immerse yourself in a beautifully illustrated world, rich with captivating visuals that bring the story to life.
- Compelling Narrative: Navigate through an intricate storyline filled with unexpected twists, as you forge connections with unique characters.
- Unveil Mysteries: Discover the secrets hidden within the cave's depths and unearth the truth behind Emilia's journey.
- Evolving Characters: Witness Emilia and the Goblin chief undergo transformative journeys, evolving through challenges and unexpected revelations.
- HD renders
- Intriguing story
- Explicit scenes
- Can be played with one hand

highlighted.name: Give the chief what he wants

content_descriptors.notes:
This game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work.
The game contains sexual content: sexual caracters, sexual acts, sexual violence, sexual assault/non-consensual sex.
It does not contains drug/alcohol abuse, self-harm, or suicide.
All characters are over the age of 18.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Steam OS or Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4700
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Version 10.11+
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4700
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Goblin Gangbang 🧟🍆👩

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4700
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 6500
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: The story of how silly Emilia met a gangbang of Goblins in the cave.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
